Uses of Interface
io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.stock.Stock

  • Packages that use Stock 
    Package Description
    io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui
    Contains all the classes that compose the User Interface of this program.
    io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.gui.dialog
    Contains dialog classes for the StockMarket program.
    io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.stock
    Provides the classes necessary to create Stock objects for this program.

    • Uses of Stock in io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.stock

      Subinterfaces of Stock in io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.stock 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  OwnedStock
      This interface extends the Stock interface with methods and fields defining a stock that is owned as part of a stock portfolio.
      Classes in io.craigmiller160.stockmarket.stock that implement Stock 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractStock
      An abstract implementation of the Stock interface.
      class  DefaultOwnedStock
      This implementation of the OwnedStock interface extends the DefaultStock class and builds on it with the properties of the new interface.
      class  DefaultStock
      Basic stock object with a range of fields that are filled by data from a StockDownloader class.
